page.title: 11LIFE STYLES
page.content:
St. Mary's school was given two separate kilometer square blocks to survey. These were Block 9872 (A) and Block 9972 (B). We made up questionnaires to see the difference in lifestyle between the blocks. 20 householders from each block were interviewed. Here are the results. HOUSES: People in Block A were better off than in Block B. Block A were private detached and semi-detached houses and bungalows. Block B consisted of a mix of private and council, semi-detached and terraced houses. On average a person living in Block A had 2.5 rooms, compared to Block B with 1.7 rooms.
See Page 12 for further results.
